name: Don't Bug Me!
description:
The latest mission to Mars is in peril! The Orion III has crash landed and sustained critical damage.

Commander Abigail Blackwell begins the emergency extraction protocol. As she rests and recharges her solar batteries, the pesky local Martians are making her life miserable. With Martian attacks looming, Houston most definitely has a problem!

Don’t Bug Me! simplifies resource management, tower defense, and first-person mechanics into a singular arcade experience.
